info.name: Remember The Milk widely(1200px)
info.description:
This style makes "Remember The Milk" widely(about 1200px). for users who are using high resolution monitor(SXGA or higher).

Related styles: style 3284, 1000px version to style 3265.
Other recommended styles: style 4887.
